name: Ashtyn Kolkman
text: There was an employee out greeting people and making sure they were attended while also maintaining a safe distance. He was very helpful and very friendly. The pizza is also very tasty. It's not greasy. Overall this was a good experience

name: Bunty Bains
text: These guys are the best,best pizza in the USA.they delivered at 11:30 pm to me at the truck stop.the pizza is really good. Thank you wish my son was here to share the goodness

name: Sammie Holso
text: A wrong address was put in. Morgan took the time and re-made our order and it was delicious. He was so prompt and made sure we got a new pizza right away. I recommend this place to anyone. Thanks Morgan!!!

name: Tracie Long
text: Awesome service not only during these trying times but also through a hail storm. The food was fresh and hot and very satisfying.

name: Roberta Marske
text: I Have Never Been To The Lunch Buffet. It Was Awesome. Very Reasonable Price's $5:99. The Waitress Was Just Great. The Food Was Fresh And Delicious. Will Go Back Again. AMEN

name: zach johansen
text: Ordered carry out. It was all ready when I got there. Everything was hot and ready when I got there. Great customer service

name: Ken Moore
text: We went there expecting fast food pizza and service... What a pleasent surprise...probably the best waiter/service we have seen in rapid City .... This gentleman checked on us several times...got food right out ....prompt on all needs an was friendly..  offered up the specials that we're current.. great job ....and food was good .

name: Bruce Lehmann
text: Good service and good meat lovers pizza.good cheese pizza to.

name: Samuel Scribe
text: Customer service... not good...

name: Tad Elf
text: Carol, who I believe is the manager, is a absolutely wonderful person. She went ABOVE and BEYOND the call of duty to make my son's 4th birthday a memorable event. This woman has a bleeding heart of gold. Hands down never had another person do so much and be so kind. 10 out of 5 stars.

name: Beau Briggs
text: Better than most Pizza Huts

name: Nicole B
text: Always Excellent Fast Fresh Delivery with excellent customer service!!!

name: Donna Musacchia
text: Most excellent customer service! And the Super Deluxe pizza is wonderful as always! The restaurant is clean and the salad bar is fresh.

name: Jewel EARNEST
text: Very clean, friendly staff good salad bar, lots of pizza. Went for Buffett.

name: Kris Cears
text: Got seated relatively quickly during the lunch rush, and the staff was very friendly. Food was decent on the buffet, would have liked to see pan-style pepperoni though, too many odd combos.

name: Stephanie Lutz
text: Great pizza, great service, nice atmosphere. You can dine in or take out or have your pie delivered. The manager is very nice and attentive, always willing to help. The staff is great. We definitely eat here a lot.

name: tatum brink
text: I ordered pizza for delivery and the man showed up went to the wrong apartment , so we called Pizza Hut they said they were sending our pizza back out so an hour later I called back and they told me they voided the order the first time ‚Ä¶More

name: Amy Moen
text: Arrived shortly before buffet ended but food was fresh hot and tasted good. Waitress was friendly nice good sense of humor

name: Jon Morrill
text: The pizza was great. Tried the meatball topping this time.  We were pleasantly surprised at how good it was with them on the pie with other toppings.  The staff was friendly and the food ready exactly at the time ordered.

name: Kay Larsen
text: Good pizza and helpful staff.

name: Rodger Oliver
text: Good pizza buffet at a reasonable price.

name: matthew hess
text: Friendly staff, clean, and awesome deal for lunch buffet

name: CJ Engel
text: The staff are always so efficient and helpful. .my order to go was still hot when I got home..it was delicious.

name: Claudio Viesca
text: This is the only Pizza Hut that has a buffet in town. It is a really good price for pizza and salad. The pizza taste awesome.

name: Trina Wheeler
text: Pretty good variety

name: Casey Martin
text: Food was good but service was not. I wasnt greeted when I came in, had to ask to be seated, didn't have my dishes pre-bussed and didn't have my soda refilled. This was the first time in a long time I haven't tipped a server (saw her only once when she delivered my one and only soda). It used to be so much better.

name: Jeff Townsend
text: Fast service and friendly staff

name: Sanford Ader
text: Only pizza hut buffet in rapid

name: Scott Sherman
text: There are three Pizza Hut locations in the Rapid City area. The one on West  Main has a salad bar. They are all good, but this one is exceptional.

name: J C
text: Just ordered the the taco pizza . what they handed me look like it has been dropped on the floor and then thrown a handful of chicken on. Wouldn't pay walked out... Day shift crew is very bad

name: Daniel Petersen
text: Good place to get pizza.  Friendly wait staff and good deals regularly.

name: Danielle Burnham
text: I love this Pizza hut, I think it's the only one left for dinning in and had a buffet. Servers are always very nice and quick.

name: Christian Stewart
text: Pizza is good. Service was decent. Didn't like the server giving me the check and standing over me as I signed my receipt. üòêüòëüòë like can I finish eating.

text: This pizza hut location has either sent us pizza that wasn't even halfway cooked properly, or sent us the completely wrong order. We've gone in for the buffet twice, and both times there was literally no pizza left. We had to wait 20 ‚Ä¶More

text: Wings are always pretty good, but damnit the pizza is bland. Not harping on this location, just pizza hut in general.

name: Jesse Haas

name: Caitlyn Hamby
text: Although the food was fine as usual,  there was only one staff member running the crossed resteraunt.  The waitress was covering everything and dropped our pizza due to stress. Eventually we had to go and get our pizza from the front ‚Ä¶More

text: I really liked it there. And the prices for lunch was fantastic!!!!  Definitely will recommend to my friends!!

name: Crystal Eby
text: My husband and I went for the lunch buffet and was very disappointed. Every pizza they put out was like the cooks were like let's see what kind of crazy creation we can come up with and let's see if they will eat it. We were there 45 minutes before we saw a pepperoni pizza.

text: Always good to visit Pizza Hut. The staff at the Rapid City Main Street are most welcoming and gracious.
